Calibration Plot Creates a calibration plot using plotly package. Returns an actual vs predicted plot. Used for model fit visualization

Source: R/calibration-plot.R
calibration_plot.Rd

Calibration Plot Creates a calibration plot using plotly package. Returns an actual vs predicted plot. Used for model fit visualization

calibration_plot(data, observed, predicted, error=0, title=NA)

Arguments

data

a data.frame
observed

variable of observed observation from data.frame, object of class string
predicted

variable of predicted observations from data.frame, object of class string
error

percent error for error bars (optional)
title

an overall title for the plot (optional), object of class string

Examples

#upload MPorT table one data set
mport <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Big-Life-Lab/bllFlow/data-visualization/inst/extdata/MPoRT-table-one.csv?token=ApmTWVvRI4hGeBRlPLR6R3P6J73Po5Paks5cWzfswA%3D%3D",
fileEncoding="UTF-8-BOM")
#> Warning: cannot open URL 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Big-Life-Lab/bllFlow/data-visualization/inst/extdata/MPoRT-table-one.csv?token=ApmTWVvRI4hGeBRlPLR6R3P6J73Po5Paks5cWzfswA%3D%3D': HTTP status was '404 Not Found'
#> Error in file(file, "rt", encoding = fileEncoding): cannot open the connection to 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Big-Life-Lab/bllFlow/data-visualization/inst/extdata/MPoRT-table-one.csv?token=ApmTWVvRI4hGeBRlPLR6R3P6J73Po5Paks5cWzfswA%3D%3D'

#create character vector of columns needed for visualizations
col <- c("observed_risk_1_year", "predicted_risk_1_year", "group_by_sex", "group_by_1", "group_by_2", "group_by_value_label_1")

#create new data frame using filter_table_1 helper function 
data<-filter_table_1(mport, col, groupby_sex="Female", groupby_1="age")
#> Error in filter_table_1(mport, col, groupby_sex = "Female", groupby_1 = "age"): could not find function "filter_table_1"

calibration_plot(data, "observed_risk_1_year", "predicted_risk_1_year", title="Observed vs Predicted for Female age")
#> Error in calibration_plot(data, "observed_risk_1_year", "predicted_risk_1_year",     title = "Observed vs Predicted for Female age"): could not find function "calibration_plot"
